title: Ticket #4673: cream_gahp should dlopen versioned library filename
description:
When the cream_gahp dlopen()s libglobus_thread_pthread, it should use the filename containing the library SO version (i.e. libglobus_thread_pthread.so.0). With proper builds that depend on Globus native packages, that's the only filename we can rely on being present.

This is also OSG ticket SOFTWARE-1636.
remarks:
2014-Nov-04 11:38:51 by jfrey:
Not so fast. In the packaging of the latest version of Globus, there is no versioned library and the unversioned one is included in the base globus-common package. So we should be opening the unversioned name.

In UW builds, we include both forms, so it doesn't matter for that release. But for people doing "proper" builds, we should use the unversioned name and that should be the dependency for native packaging of the resulting build.

The short version is that I'm undoing this change.
